item.title: About
item.description: Hello, I am a senior undergraduate student at Istanbul Technical University, studying Computer Engineering. You can find my resume on my LinkedIn page. In my free time, I like to solve algorithm problems and participate in competitions. I am also interested in philosophy, economics and politics. In this blog, I plan to share algorithm problems that I like, posts related to computer engineering and ideas on other areas that I am interested in.
